BUEN JUEGO

Da acensão a queda do Dead By daylight, o jogo após o implemento de novo rank se tornou uma bagunça, onde o nova aplicação de MMR é injusta e feito de forma abrupta, somado a uma mistura de jogadores que já não ligavam para o rank e só jogavam para diversão; os super ''tryhards'' do meta atual; e outros já de péssima índole nesse ''MIX'' novo de obrigatoriedade com a partida e assim te condicionando a não abandonar a partida. Dessa forma seria positiva como forma de evitar má conduta de jogadores que abandonam sem mais nem menos. Infelizmente também faz com que killers toxicos e antidesportivos usufruam de mecânicas nada divertidas dentro do game e ainda sim pontuam, prejudicando os sobreviventes. 
Acredito que dessa forma o game que bateu records de jogadores recentemente terá uma perda substancial dos mesmos.

Apesar do que algumas pessoas falam, Dead by Daylight me pegou muito de surpresa, o único tipo de jogo que eu me considerava "bom", eram os MOBA, porém resolvi testar DbD depois de pensar muito tempo em compra-lo, e me surpreendi, depois de alguns dias de gameplay, já consigo fazer o básico sem pensar e loopar uma parte de killers, e o jogo é sensacional, o único jogo que fez eu me sentir nervoso em muito tempo, o fato de começar cada partida sem saber quem é o killer, mas ele saber quem é você, o jogo também tem muita variedade de builds e itens, sobreviventes e killers, o jogo precisa melhorar muito o quesito de punição, seja por toxicidade ou anti-jogo ( Killer que campera gancho, acho que a punição de pontos poderia ser maior ), as DLCs eu só me interessei por duas até então, SAW e Silent Hill, até porque já era um grande fã dessas franquias antes de conhecer o game, o jogo vai te punir muito no inicio, sendo sobrevivente ou killer, mas como diz Jake de hora de aventura, "o primeiro passo para sermos bons em algo, é sermos péssimos nesse algo"...
Dead By Daylight é um jogo que ainda vai me proporcionar MUITAS horas de gameplay, aproveita que nesse momento ele ta em promoção

I enjoy the complexities of this game and all the fear it and anxiety it can induce. I'm not great at the reactionary quick-saves but I still have a lot of fun playing, even if a miss one of the skill checks because of just the great atmosphere and sense of teamwork in this game.

+ Zábavné a propracované
+ Výborná atmosféra
+ Obrovská volnost přizpůsobení survivorů a killerů
+ Můžete jet za jakéhokoli survivora, protože perky survivora se po odemčení v bloodwebu odemykají pro jakoukoli postavu
+ LVL survivora se zvyšuje body, které získáte za jakéhokoli survivora, nebo vraha. Takže nemusíte hrát za někoho, kdo vám nesedne, nelíbí se vám,...
+ Challenge - super zpestření hry
+ LVL progress - jak postav, hodnocení hráče (grade), tak účtu/profilu
+ Bodový systém zápasů mně směroval, abych se nezaměřovat na jednu roli, ale byl více variabilní a týmový hráč
+ Velkou část survivorů a killerů lze koupit za body, které dostáváte za lvl účtu (trvá to)
+ Neustále na hře pracují - vylepšení, servis, upgrady, nové postavy, ...

The time has come, my review is here.
To be honest, I like/love this game.
Does it make me wanna die? [b]DEFINITELY[/b]
Does it have a lot of freaking bugs? [b]ABSOFUCKINGLUTELY[/b]
Could the MM & Point measurement system be better? [b]You bet.[/b]
Are there retarded players for instance non-cooperating teammates, campers and a lot more? [b]Of course[/b], but in what game do you have all-around perfect players that are not going through something at a time? You can work with anything you are given and if not... you can still go next. I would say it is on the same level with League of Legends in these terms. 

Once you get in you can just keep getting better and trust me - the hours spent on this will be seen on the gameplay.
There is a lot of space to improve yourself. Not just as a survivor and killer, but as a person too. You gotta find that inner peace, bud.

There really aren't any games in the genre that compete at all. I love the game, and I recommend it to anyone whos looking for a semi-competitive fun game with two distinct gamemodes that play completely different. 

I am not a horror fan at all but I still love the game, and my only hesitation in reviewing it positively would be to temper your expectations about its horror aspects. It is certainly high-adrenaline and exciting, but the horror elements go away fairly fast. Do not expect it to give constant scares, but rather to use that horror as an aesthetic for a great multiplayer game.

Разработчики данной игры молодцы конечно. Однако в ней есть много минусов. Например: навыки или скорость действий многих охотников слишком быстрая и нечестная, атака с дистанции, телепортация к другим выжившим и т.д. За обычных охотников хрен выйграешь. Либо стой и жди пока кто-то другой игрок будет спасать с крюка одного человека и нападай. Либо покупать охотников и использовать их навыки и тем самым усложняя игру другим игрокам. Где БАЛАНС??? Одни охотники телепартируются, видят на всю локацию всех выживших, некоторые кидаются своим же оружием или выносят с одного удара. Такое выстраивается впечатление, что в эту игру стоит только донатить и тем самым за охотников постоянно выйгрывать. А как же выжившие? Как им побеждать? Есть те игроки, которые стараются честно играть, однако такими темпами игру можно забросить. Зря только деньги потратил. Разработчики! Вы всё больше добавляете локации и персонажей, но а где собственно говоря БАЛАНС. Сбалансировали хотя бы подбор игроков по рангу. А не так, что новичок впервые играет, а уже с первого матча встречает игрока, который задонатил ради крутого и нечестного охотника. Хоть я и играю несколько часов, однако об этой игре я уже давно ознакомлён. Не усложняйте жизнь другим людям. Подумайте об этом!

Used to love this game and I'm still trying but ever since the new Matchmaking update not only does it take way longer to get into a match, I also get stomped 90% of the time. Where I literally don't have a chance, I'm either against a hacker or hackers, or the opposing side just messes with me the whole game and refuses to end the match which results in me wasting time or having to leave the match where it also punishes me for leaving after the other side was abusing me and delaying the game by hiding and not doing the objectives. Regardless of win or lose, players are so damn toxic too. If I win, I'm cheating. If I lose, I suck. Starting to feel like League of legends, just a constant torrential downpour of hate and negativity.

Revert back to your better matchmaking so I can have fun again and not have to try my hardest just to get shit on.

I'm not gonna lie, this game was fun as hell in like 2018. Now its dog shit and the developers only care about adding more shit into the game instead of fixing the shit they have right now. Remember when perks used to be simple, like "you see homies through walls in a 32 meter range"? now we have "when you slap someone they get reduced speed for fucking everything until they can figure out what the square root of 2 is and type it in fucking braille." Honest to god man those canadians only want to add more goddamn cosmetics in. They know thats the easiest way to make money. And why the fuck do you have to buy a battle pass when you already pay for the fucking game? Microtransactions? in a game you already paid for? The developers are greedy as hell now. Honestly such a fucking disappointment. Oh? And do you want to play the game alone? Solo-queue survivor? Make sure to take your antidepressants first because it instills an emotion so vial and esoteric that only fucking lovecraft would be able to describe the horror drilled into your mind. Simply, you will want to kill yourself. Crossplay? Fuck you. This is not a review discouraging you from buying the game, this is just a review letting you know that the developers who made this game have only made bad choices since 2019.
